channel.title: Luckscape RELEASE V1
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
Today I finished somewhat enough to release a nice V1 source + client for you. I've worked 1 month on the client + source for new items, new interfaces and other stuff so plz do NOT flame. The client is WEBCLIENT ready. and it should auto-download.
[b]CREDITS: Source: 50% Me 45% Maker of [PI] 5% Demise for Highscore tut[/b]
[i]Credits: CLIENT: 55% Soul split (cuz it was webclient ready already) 45% Me (adding new interfaces models)[/i]
~Source feature
* WORKING CLUE SCROLLS! Only need to be added @ NPC drops! * Ingame highscore! (Thx to demise) * All godwars special anim + gfx 100% * Duel Arena * Training locations are good to go * Hybriding not that good I gotta tell. but it's a nice start :) * Autocasting * Barrows * Pest Control * Clan Chat * All skills working! * Slayer with Tasks * God Wars (basic) * KBD * Dagannoth Kings * Chaos Elemental * CORP! (NOT ANIMATED!) * Fight Pits * Jad * Obelisks that teleport you around in wild * Split Private Chat * Duping Fixed * Emotes * Trade (DUPES FIXED) * Great Economy * PKP SHOP * Slayer shop READY to set up! * Perfect Pking! * Custom assault + SHOP working! * Correct anims for woodcutting * Clipped firemaking + Showing fire on ground!
~Client features
*Colored whips * Newest Trade interface * Newest Bank interface * Newest Shop interface * Dragon kiteshield (NOW WORKING AS DFS!) * slayer helm!
[center]PICTURES:
[URL=http://img842.imageshack.us/i/assaultinterface.jpg/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/3397/assaultinterface.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“denhanhan, post:15, topic:380323”]Soz for gravedigging, But this is NOT 100% Duel Arena, Ive based my server on this, and duel arena is full with glitches and buggs,[/quote]Dude, there’s a V2 with much better features. Please don’t gravedig old sources?

EDIT:

Here you go: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,477019.0.html

item.title: Luckscape RELEASE V1
item.dc:creator: @Plehhhhh Plehhhhh
item.description:
@Plehhhhh wrote:

sfter i start the sever and stuff, i click run(64bit) and i get this error

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

… please help :mad: …

NEVER MIND SOLVED!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Luckscape RELEASE V1
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Maikie61, post:4, topic:380323”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=476154.msg3482170#msg3482170 date=1296263665]
8% You
92% Insanity

Fixed the credits you had, sir.
[/quote]

Why not say that everywhere?
Cuz if i see my sources, then It has more potionel and stuff than the other sources from [PI] (or same potionel IDK)[/quote]
The only thing I see different with your source then others are that you have customs, that usually will make a server not very popular.
Also customs will slow down a client’s processing system and will make the connected user lag.

Read full topic

item.title: Luckscape RELEASE V1
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

Hello Everyone,

Today I finished somewhat enough to release a nice V1 source + client for you.
I’ve worked 1 month on the client + source for new items, new interfaces and other stuff so plz do NOT flame.
The client is WEBCLIENT ready. and it should auto-download.

CREDITS:
Source:
50% Me
45% Maker of [PI]
5% Demise for Highscore tut

Credits:
CLIENT:
55% Soul split (cuz it was webclient ready already)
45% Me (adding new interfaces models)

~Source feature

  • WORKING CLUE SCROLLS! Only need to be added @ NPC drops!
  • Ingame highscore! (Thx to demise)
  • All godwars special anim + gfx 100%
  • Duel Arena
  • Training locations are good to go
  • Hybriding not that good I gotta tell. but it’s a nice start
  • Autocasting
  • Barrows
  • Pest Control
  • Clan Chat
  • All skills working!
  • Slayer with Tasks
  • God Wars (basic)
  • KBD
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Chaos Elemental
  • CORP! (NOT ANIMATED!)
  • Fight Pits
  • Jad
  • Obelisks that teleport you around in wild
  • Split Private Chat
  • Duping Fixed
  • Emotes
  • Trade (DUPES FIXED)
  • Great Economy
  • PKP SHOP
  • Slayer shop READY to set up!
  • Perfect Pking!
  • Custom assault + SHOP working!
  • Correct anims for woodcutting
  • Clipped firemaking + Showing fire on ground!

~Client features

*Colored whips

  • Newest Trade interface
  • Newest Bank interface
  • Newest Shop interface
  • Dragon kiteshield (NOW WORKING AS DFS!)
  • slayer helm!

[center]PICTURES:

Uploaded with ImageShack.us
